name: testing
description: End-to-end testing with Playwright for web applications

examples.name: Landing Page Test
examples.description: Test landing page functionality and interactions

guidelines: Write tests that are independent and can run in any order
Use Page Object Model pattern for better maintainability
Test across multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
Use data-testid attributes for reliable selectors
Add visual regression tests for important pages
Mock external API calls for consistent testing
Use fixtures for test data setup and teardown
Generate and review HTML test reports
